name: Erannorth Chronicles
description:
Erannorth Chronicles is an old-school sandbox RPG/Card Game with focus in Deck-Building freedom and Character Customization.

Character Customization Freedom.


  • Create your unique Hero by choosing from 9 Species (with 35 variants) and 9 Classes (with 47 specializations) each with different Skills, Perks, Starting Decks and Card Pools.
  • Your Skills will affect both your card pool and the effectiveness of your cards, while your Perks will let you increase specific effects and tailor your cards around your build.
  • No tedious Unlock systems. Play the hero you want, whenever you want.

Deckbuilding Freedom.


  • Build hundreds of different decks and collect over 2630+ cards.
  • Adjust your Deck and Add and Remove the cards you collect at any time.
  • Tactically switch Decks & Equipment during Encounters to gain advantage or just get out of a tough spot.
  • Fetch & Use Consumables from your Backpack.

Free Sandbox Exploration.


  • Roam in a large sandbox world with many different locations, challenges and treasure hunts.
  • No 'forced story'. Just your imagination (and dozens of multi-branching and randomized events to spice up and make each Adventure feel different).
  • Choose which areas to explore (and when).
  • Adapting your deck to gain advantage or to overcome the ever-changing leylines can be the key between life and death.
  • Experiment with different Action card combinations and overcome over 200+ unique enemies that can level up "indefinitely".
  • Enemies have different Damage types, Resistances, Vulnerabilities, Immunities and a decision making AI that will react to your Actions. Your build *will* fail. But you have all the tools to bounce back and adapt.

Full Modding and Steam Workshop Support


  • Single player means 'your game, your rules'. And Erannorth let's you do just that.
  • Adapt the game to your skill by making everything harder, more hardcore and rogue-like, or easier, casual and relaxing.
  • Tweak, Mod and create your own game modes, locations, events, enemies, cards, classes & species and more. All the software you need is your text editor of choice.
  • Change the card, ally and enemy artworks just by copy/pasting your own images into a mod folder.
  • Modding a game was never easier!
